thread.title: Dwarfs coach JE Sarpong confident of signing quality replacements for departed stars
thread.title_full: Dwarfs coach JE Sarpong confident of signing quality replacements for departed stars

title: Dwarfs coach JE Sarpong confident of signing quality replacements for departed stars
text:
Sports News | 14 October 2015 20:25 CET Dwarfs coach JE Sarpong confident of signing quality replacements for departed stars - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Coach of Ebusua Dwarfs J.E Sarpong is confident of finding suitable replacements for players who will be leaving the side as they prepare for their return to the Premier League. 
The Mysterious club have secured promotion back to the Ghanaian top flight having won Zone 2 of the second tier league. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
